snippet.title: Gladihaters -  Game Announcement Trailer (Updated)
snippet.description:
Gladihaters is now available on Early Access on Steam!
Gladihaters is a fighting / management game, where you host fights between prisoners which are clones of polemic historical figures in a cyberpunk prison.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1559580/Gladihaters/

https://twitter.com/gladihaters

https://www.instagram.com/gladihaters/

https://www.gladihaters.com

A fight to the death
Between the clones of historical deviants who went against the Glorious State.
Where the winner
Doesn’t matter
As long as you make a profit.
Warden, you have three hundred and five days to CLONE, FIGHT, MANAGE, FIGHT,  UPGRADE, FIGHT, SPONSOR, FIGHT.
And win the Prison Arena of the Year Award
All for the glorious state
Gladihaters, Fight!
